name: Xi Wangmu
title: Chinese - Xi Wangmu
description: Xi Wangmu is one of the oldest and most powerful goddesses in Chinese mythology, the immortal Queen who rules from her paradise on Mount Kunlun. Guardian of the Peaches of Immortality and keeper of the elixir of eternal life, she presides over female immortals and represents the ultimate yin principle of the cosmos.
domains: Supreme embodiment of cosmic yin energy
Represents the west, autumn, metal element
All female immortals are under her authority
Represents the goal of Daoist cultivation
symbols: Sweet foods: Cakes, candied fruits, sweet rice
Those seeking longevity and good health

relationships.father: of the east): her masculine counterpart representing yang
relationships.consort: or the complementary yang ruler; in some traditions they are co-rulers of heaven
